attributes.name: Right knee
attributes.description: Measure genu varus or valgus 1. Mechanical axis of femur MAF line from top of femoral head through intercondylar notch 2. Tibial axis TA line from intercondylare notch to mid tibial plafond 3. Angle between continuation of MAF to level of tibia and TA

attributes.name: Alignment, right knee
attributes.description: Genu varus valgus or normal alignment. Mechanical axis MA line from top of femoral head to mid tibial plafond. If MA medial to intercondylar notch -  genu varus .If MA lateral to intercondylar notch  - genu valgus . If MA with in the intercondylar notch - normal alignment.

attributes.name: Left knee
attributes.description: Measure genu varus or valgus 1. Mechanical axis of femur MAF line from top of femoral head through intercondylar notch 2. Tibial axis TA line from intercondylare notch to mid tibial plafond 3. Angle between continuation of MAF to level of tibia and TA

attributes.name: Alignment, left knee
attributes.description: Genu varus valgus or normal alignment. Mechanical axis MA line from top of femoral head to mid tibial plafond. If MA medial to intercondylar notch -  genu varus .If MA lateral to intercondylar notch  - genu valgus . If MA with in the intercondylar notch - normal alignment
